content: Hi. Do we have an HL7 template / an example IG that shows how to use the IG publisher and all its features? Can I assist there? I was stuck in Lloyd's old template sdc2 but seems the world has changed since. Is the Da Vinci CRD the most up to date template?
i liked @Eric Haas 's idea of IG with kitties. Or if we have some sort of a "base" template, that would also be fine. Looking forward to help

Da Vinci CRD and SDC are now using the same framework, which is my latest. Eric is reviewing to see if there are any changes he needs to be fully comfortable with it. And it's going to need to be revamped to move to this new "shared IG Framework" architecture.
are there instructions on how to use this ig publisher template in other projects?
no because you have to rework your whole ig for it. I'm going to work on getting all this to work ASAP after the baltimore meetings- need to make some decisions there
